node.title: Ten Accurate Ways to Predict the Future
node.description: It is not just prophets that are to understand the future. All who are wise should be able to know the future. Solomon said, “The wise man foreseeth the evil day and hideth himself." Fools don’t understand this vital information and Solomon says they “pass on and are destroyed.” God has made it possible for the wise to foresee the future. This reviews ten ways the Bible gives us so that we can have wisdom.
